actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to require that the operation of a school bus be treated under that Act as oppressive child labor for employees under the age of 18.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to specify the operation of a school bus by an individual younger than 18 years of age as oppressive child labor.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to require that the operation of a school bus be treated under that Act as oppressive child labor for employees under the age of 18.
